db:info.db:title: Qt Quick Controls - To Do List

db:abstract.db:para: To do list application for iOS.

db:article.db:para: This example demonstrates how to create a simple to do list application for iOS using the iOS Style.
The example also shows how an in-memory SQL database can be created and used purely through QML, without needing C++, through the use of LocalStorage.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
